snippet.title: Desktop Survivors 98 - Announcement Trailer | Demo Out Now!
snippet.description:
I'm very excited to be dropping the announcement trailer for my game Desktop Survivors 98 :)

Desktop Survivors 98 is a chaotic roguelite that plays directly over your desktop! Your cursor becomes the hero - will you survive?

Check out the demo and wishlist! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3339780
More info can be found here: https://desktopsurvivors98.com/

Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/bhesslau.bsky.social
